ComicInfo.Summary:
This story of Lara's covers her first adventure.
Questing for a legendary relic, Lara must stay alive long enough to make amends for an error from her past.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-28 21:25:13. [CVDB119060] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev43 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-18 09:16:31. [Issue ID 119060]
